body:
Hey all,

I've been trying to run this file: 

[008_Honeybee%20EnergyPlus%20Simulation.gh](http://api.ning.com/files/JeioNtmyO2YmdRpV3MHTg4Y8Mm66-4DgHOt-eDhRimW58WvVJQFkdAkVX29GrBglMiKmCDWp9ajrDisspe92p0O3ugzfeSbW/008_HoneybeeEnergyPlusSimulation.gh)

with this Rhino file:

[4.6.3dm](http://api.ning.com/files/JeioNtmyO2YiPP-ouNIrH9F9-NvH-TTm7mpIi8vqFUZsEZ65etc0H4N1kxfzG8xuzXmA*afbgP0MEBDrUvMmXZpCt*AXHoXO/4.6.3dm)



and when running the simulation I got this error:

1. Solution exception:global name 'additionalStrings_' is not defined

[additionalstrings_%20error.jpg](http://api.ning.com/files/JeioNtmyO2a*o3qvzZ9HUBhLHcfazqhNCj*TzgDxC9CjyUwYPNs6y6mkiU8EPnqoLLcSe49HDNNHoQbW*RDZ*BeSqKg84FwW/additionalstrings_error.jpg)



I tried reinstalling EnergyPlus (8.2.0) and run it again. No use.



Ideas???



Thanks



Shai

replies.body:
S,

You need to reinsert the HB_runEnergySimulation component. Seems to be that you updated the file using the HB_Update component. This usually works well, but when the the updated version of the component has more input/output items it doesn't, even though it appears it was updated.

You can tell when you get errors like this one.

-A.

A,



Thanks! I reinserted the component and it worked. 

I think your comment is useful to the rest of similar cases. 



Thanks a lot!
